        username - The username of the user
        password - The password of the user
        bsk - The bsk of the user
        bvk - The bvk of the user
        svk - The svk of the user

      • askForChallengeToServer

        public java.math.BigInteger[] askForChallengeToServer(java.lang.String website)
        Function which asks the server a challenge
        Parameters:
        website - The address of the server
        Returns:
        The challenge in the case of Server Optimal protocol and the id and the challenge in the case of Storage Optimal protocol
